message.body: Hey Brian, how's fatherhood treating you? Congrats! I was looking at UA 690 plumber union website to find classes, but their website is way glitchy. Are u familiar? Do u know who I can contact about school for plumbing?
Hey man thanks, being a dad is real cool, what are your goals with these classes?

We'll I don't know if I will go all the way through an apprenticeship bc it looks like it takes five years but I would like to get some kind of certification and learn the stuff I don't know yet. Heating systems, cistern to pumps to domestic, well pump

The plumbing apprenticeship that I know about is aimed toward folks working in the field during the day, Andrew who works with me is I his second year, it's a four year program and it's 2 nights a week
It's through the phcc I'll find out more, it costs $1500/ year.... Andrew can tell you about his experience sometime if you'd like
